document.masterDocTitle: The species of the genus Diaclina Jacquelin du Val (Coleoptera: Tenebrionidae: Alphitobiini) from Sub-Saharan Africa

Distribution: Gabon ( type locality); Guinea , Congo ( Gebien 1921 ; Ardoin 1963 , 1965 ); Ivory Coast ( Ardoin 1969 , 1980 ); Tanzania ( Ardoin 1976 , Ferrer 2005 ); Ghana , Togo , Cameroon , Uganda , Rwanda , Kenya , Mozambique , Angola , Zimbabwe , South Africa .
